remarks: Ordering elimination by cases.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Jul-2007.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
ltlecasei.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ A < B ) -> ps ) $.
ltlecasei.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ B <_ A ) -> ps ) $.
ltlecasei.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltlecasei.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ltlecasei $p |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
